about_the_game:
Step into a peaceful and immersive world where you become an unseen observer in a private bathroom retreat. La Douche is a chill, atmospheric experience designed for relaxation, letting you appreciate the beauty of simple moments.

Key Features
  • A Serene Daily Routine – Watch as a beautiful woman goes through her natural routine, including bathing, light exercise, and dance practice.
  • Soothing Atmosphere – Enjoy the calming sounds of water, the soft melodies of her singing, and the gentle ambiance of an outdoor garden.
  • Capture the Moment – Use your camera to take pictures and preserve the experience from your own perspective.
  • Desktop & VR Support – Immerse yourself fully in VR or enjoy the experience on your monitor.

La Douche is not a challenge, nor a game to win—it’s a space to unwind, observe, and enjoy a moment of quiet intimacy.

content_descriptors.notes: Players may chose to remove the character's clothes.

name: La Douche

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i3 processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
